sense.def:
To tackle a difficult task
pomeni odločno začeti reševati zahtevno nalogo.

seg.quote: ...a means of tackling the growing housing problem.

sense.def:
To tackle someone
pomeni, da v športni igri, na primer pri nogometu, nasprotniku poskušamo vzeti žogo.

seg.quote: He was tackled before he had a chance to shoot.
The tackle looked fair but a free kick was awarded.

sense.def:
To tackle someone about a matter
pomeni govoriti z nekom, da bi nekaj spremenili ali drugače izvedli.

seg.quote: He tackled me about several editorials I had written.

sense.def:
Tackle
je oprema, ki jo potrebujemo za neko dejavnost, zlasti za ribolov.
